basic.description: This survey course will provide an overview of the health, health service, and policy context in which Epidemiologic and health service methods are applied. Secondly, it is intended to provide a brief introduction to selected research areas available for more in depth study through elective courses. Topics include: public health and health determinants; health services and the health care system; health economics and cost evaluations; and health policy and policy analysis. Three term-hours, fall; every year. H. Stuart
basic.subject: EPID
basic.title: Issues in Health Policy and Health Services
